Title: Plan B
Plot: A recovered Said ostracizes Huseni Mershah for turning his back on him when he was dying--and orders all the Muslims to cast him out. Impressed by Said's power, Groves decides to kill Glynn in his honor, but ends up stabbing and killing an officer by mistake. Condemned to death, Groves chooses the firing squad as his form of execution. Meanwhile, Schibetta is still being fed ground glass by O'Reilly and Adebisi, and ends up hemmorhaging. Beecher, transformed by prison life, finally gets revenge
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Roger Guenveur Smith, Zuill Bailey, Murphy Guyer, Wood Hunt, Curtis L. McClarin, Novella Nelson, Brian Sledge, Skipp Sudduth, Wood Harris
